createEvent.title: Create New Event
createEvent.description: Share your community gathering with Kyrgyz people across the US
createEvent.createdBy: This event will be created by:
createEvent.reviewNote: Your event will be reviewed and published soon.
createEvent.loginSubtitle: You must be logged in to create a community event.
createEvent.loginHint: After logging in, you can share events with the Kyrgyz diaspora!

about.heroText: A community-driven organization preserving Kyrgyz identity, culture, and unity across the U.S.

language.title: Language Revitalization
language.text: We are passionately committed to facilitating the learning of the Kyrgyz language, providing a platform for individuals to reconnect with their roots.

culture.title: Cultural Preservation
culture.text: Through events, workshops, and educational programs, we aim to instill a sense of pride and appreciation for our heritage.

consular.title: Consular Services
consular.text1: We help community members with official consular services to make your life in the U.S. easier and stress-free. Our services include:

list.appointment: Scheduling and guidance for consular appointments

consular.text2: Whether you are updating your documents or need guidance for your next consular visit, our team is here to support you step by step.

tax.title: Tax Services & Consultations
tax.text: Partnership with BK Tax Solutions. Members get a 10% discount.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.noEvents: No events at the moment. Stay tuned for announcements!

home.heroText: Uniting Kyrgyz people across America through events, resources, and cultural pride üá∞üá¨

whyJoin.title: Why Join Us?
whyJoin.description: Hear from our members and see why being part of Union KG matters.

testimonials.name: Aizada
testimonials.text: Thanks to Union KG, I found a network of Kyrgyz friends in New York and USA and never felt alone.

testimonials.name: Bakyt
testimonials.text: This platform helped me discover Kyrgyz concerts and connect with my roots.

testimonials.name: Saltanat
testimonials.text: Union KG is preserving our culture while supporting the new generation.

joinCommunity.title: Join Our Community
joinCommunity.text: Share events, support each other, and help preserve Kyrgyz culture in America. Together, we are stronger.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Discover celebrations, concerts, sports tournaments, and cultural gatherings of the Kyrgyz diaspora across the United States.
events.noEvents: No events at the moment. Stay tuned for announcements!

dashboard.loggedInMessage: You're successfully logged into the Kyrgyz Diaspora community platform.
dashboard.activityText:
Events you've joined, donations made, and community updates will appear here soon.
We're building tools to help Kyrgyz people in New York stay connected and support each other.

auth.loginSubtitle: Log in to continue exploring events and donations
auth.registerSubtitle: Create an account to join our growing diaspora platform

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: Supporting Kyrgyz diaspora through events, resources, and community building.
whatWeDo.eventsText: Concerts, holidays, sports tournaments, and meetups that bring us together.
whatWeDo.resourcesText: Find businesses, jobs, immigration resources, organizations, and cultural centers within the Kyrgyz community.
whatWeDo.aboutText: Learn about our mission to preserve Kyrgyz identity and empower immigrants.

community.title: Community
community.description: A glimpse into our culture, traditions, and unity.
community.imageAlt: Kyrgyz community in the USA ‚Äì events, culture, and togetherness

resources.title: Useful Information for Kyrgyz Diaspora in the USA
resources.medicalText: In the USA, health insurance is essential. Without it, treatment can be very expensive. Citizens and residents have access to government and private programs:

medicalList.medicaid: Medicaid ‚Äî free insurance for low-income individuals.
medicalList.emergency: Emergency Medicaid ‚Äî for non-immigrants and those awaiting status (e.g., asylum seekers) in emergencies.

resources.communityCenters: In major cities, there are Community Health Centers that provide services at reduced cost regardless of status.
resources.housingText: A list of resources for finding housing, rentals, and jobs in various US cities will appear here soon. We will update this section to help Kyrgyz people living in America.
resources.housingTemp: For now, you can use the following sites for housing and job search:
resources.supportText: If you have questions for the consulate or suggestions for the community, you can leave them below. We will try to forward them to consulate representatives and Kyrgyz diaspora activists.
resources.successMessage: Thank you! Your question has been sent.
